name: playwright
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides browser automation capabilities using [Playwright](https://playwright.dev). This server enables LLMs to interact with web pages through structured accessibility snapshots, bypassing the need for screenshots or visually-tuned models.

tools.name: browser_wait
tools.description: Wait for a specified time in seconds

tools.name: browser_install
tools.description: Install the browser specified in the config. Call this if you get an error about the browser not being installed.

tools.name: browser_press_key
tools.description: Press a key on the keyboard

tools.name: browser_navigate_back
tools.description: Go back to the previous page

tools.name: browser_navigate_forward
tools.description: Go forward to the next page

tools.name: browser_screen_capture
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

tools.name: browser_screen_move_mouse
tools.description: Move mouse to a given position

prompts.text: Navigate to google.com and search for 'playwright automation'
Fill out a login form with username 'test@example.com' and password 'password123'
Take a snapshot of the current page and click on the first search result
Open a new tab, navigate to github.com, and then switch back to the first tab
Navigate to a shopping website, add an item to cart, and proceed to checkout
Fill out a form with multiple fields and submit it
Take a screenshot of the current page
Navigate to a website with a dropdown menu and select an option
Upload a file to a website
Extract data from a table on a webpage
